articles.description: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das had announced in October that the system will be available at all times from December 2020 to make online fund transfer smooth.
articles.content: The Real Time Gross Settlement System (RTGS) for high-value transactions will be available round-the-clock from Monday, making India one of the few countries in the world to operate the system 24X7.… [+1531 chars]

articles.title: See the historic roll out of COVID-19 vaccine from Pfizer's factory - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: Every US state is set to receive its first doses of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine on Monday, days after the FDA approved it for emergency use.

articles.title: UNESCO to launch international prize in the name of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib - All India Radio
articles.description: The UNESCO has decided to launch an international prize in the field of ‘creative economy’ in the name of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman.

articles.title: IRCTC Offer For Sale Successful, Government Prunes Stake By 20% - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The Centre had set floor price for the OFS, which was held on Thursday and Friday, at Rs 1,367; but most bids came around Rs 1,378, as per data provided by the stock exchanges
articles.content:
Following the share sale, the government's stake in IRCTC will reduce to 67.4 per cent.
